translation: But you are not able to behold Me with these your own eyes; I give you the divine eye; behold My lordly Yoga.
commentary: 11.8 Not not? You but? Maam Me? Shakyase (thou) canst? to see to see? Anen with this? Eve even? Svachakshusha with own eyes? divine divine? I give (I) give? They (to) thee? The eye the eye? See behold? May My? Yogam Yoga? Aishvaram lordly.Commentary No fleshly eyes can behold Me in My Cosmic Form. One can see It through the divine eye or the eye of intuition. It should not be confused with seeing through the
